iti111:5.1: viharataṃ → bhavataṃ (s1-3), kimassa uttari karaṇīyaṃ → kissa bhikkhave uttariṃ karaṇīyaṃ (bj) | kimassa bhikkhave uttari karaṇīyaṃ (s1-3) | kiñcassa bhikkhave uttari karaṇīyaṃ (pts1)
iti111:6.1: abhijjhā, byāpādo vigato →  abhijjhā vigatā hoti, byāpādo vigato hoti (sī1, syā1-3, pā1, cha1) 15A4:86, thinamiddhaṃ vigataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vigataṃ hoti, vicikicchā → thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchā (15A4:86), asammuṭṭhā → appamuṭṭhā (s1-3)
